articles.description: JWST isn't the first telescope to peer into this factory of star-birth some 5500 light-years away, but its views are the most educational.

articles.author: Lois Mackenzie
articles.title: Moon phase today: What the moon will look like on September 8, 2025 - Mashable
articles.description: The moon will start getting darker now.
